original_title: 素子のセンタク, 恋か剣... 「泣くな」
overview: Out of nowhere, Motokos' sister (Tsuroko) appears and is ready to pass on the dojo. However, Motoko is still not quite as strong as her sister and when her big sister finds out about this, she gives Motoko an ultimatum- Motoko must beat her sister or marry Keitaro!
title: Love Hina: Motoko's Choice, Love or the Sword - Don't Cry
